page.title: 18BRANT BROUGHTON LEISURE
page.content: Children's leisure activities include watching TV and video programmes, playing computer games, listening to music, belonging to clubs, cycling, collecting,reading - especially multi- choice books,and playing with friends. Favourite TV programmes include Airwolf, Street Hawk, The A Team and cartoons such as Scooby Doo and Dangermouse.About a third of the junior children have access to home computers,mainly Spectrum, Electron or BBC models.Portable stereo cassettes with headphones are popular at the moment, as is BMX cycling and racing. Several children belong to scout or guide groups although they have to go out of the village for this.Items collected include stamps,model aircraft,soldiers and farm machinery, rubbers, care bears and fairy dolls. Some girls go horse riding and dancing
